page.title: 10ENTERTAINMENT IN PERTH
page.content: { CEILIDHS}(literally Gaelic for a "get together" which is a Scottish night with country dancing, tartan and stovies) are regularly held in several hotels in the city centre. Live entertainment is performed several nights per week during the summer season for tourists. The City Hall hosts a variety of entertainment throughout the year. A major annual event is{"PERTH FESTIVAL {OF THE ARTS"}which lasts for 10 days and attracts many top international musicians and orchestras. Another aspect of the festival is a display of arts and crafts by local people. { PERTH MUSICAL FESTIVAL COMPETITION has been held annually in the City Hall for the past 61 years.For 2 weeks local schoolchildren,organisations and young musicians sing,dance and play in competition with each other.
